attributes.action: Stop the closure of the AnE department at King Georges Hospital Redbridge, as we fear this will ultimately result in the closure of the hospital as a whole.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the closure of the AnE department at King Georges Hospital Redbridge, as we fear this will ultimately result in the closure of the hospital as a whole and have a detrimental effect on our community

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to stop the closure of the AnE department at King Georges Hospital Redbridge, as we fear this will ultimately result in the closure of the hospital as a whole.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=SaveKGHospital


Her Majesty's Government
